mapper.insert: insert into orders (user_id, address, state ) values (#{userId}, #{address}, #{state})
insert into order_goods (order_id, goods_id, order_price, amount) values (#{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{orderPrice}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select o.id, a.uuid, a.upload_path, a.file_name, g.name, og.order_price, og.amount, o.address, o.state, o.order_date from order_goods og join orders o on og.order_id = o.id join attach a on og.goods_id = a.goods_id join goods g on og.goods_id = g.id where user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from order_goods og join orders o on og.order_id = o.id join attach a on og.goods_id = a.goods_id join goods g on og.goods_id = g.id where user_id = #{userId}
